adHeader: Swimming Pool and Spa / Hot Tub Service
adDetails: I'm a pool / spa technician with 17 years experience as a repairman. I install and repair all pool equipment including pumps, heaters, filters, controls, automation, deck-o-seals, all all other pool related equipment. I also sell and install energy efficient equipment such as dual speed and variable speed pumps and motors. If you are looking for a professional repairman, call today. *We also Offer Weekly Cleaning Services* www.southbaywatertech.com South Bay Water Tech show contact info San Jose, Morgan Hill, Gilroy, Los Gatos, Saratoga, Cupertino, Sunnyvale, Palo Alto, Los Altos, Milpitas
